abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews restaurant Bite of Hong Kong in Manhattan's Chinatown.

headline.print_headline: Flavorful Bites to Try and Try Again
headline.main: Bite of Hong Kong Requires More Than a Few Nibbles

keywords.value: Bite of Hong Kong (Manhattan, NY, Restaurant)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The vast menu at a Cantonese restaurant in Chinatown rewards careful study and repeat visits.
lead_paragraph: The vast menu at a Cantonese restaurant in Chinatown rewards careful study and repeat visits.
